about_the_game:
Today was supposed to be just another day in the life of a farmer. Another day pining for the girl he loves. Today was not about watching bandits wreck everything and kidnap his crush.

Now taking on the role of Castor armed with an oversized carrot and a sip of courage, you must traverse treacherous terrain and powerful foes to save your crush in this 2D action platformer!


  • Travel across varied locales from mushroom forests to abandoned castles, all while contending with all manner of danger lurking about!
  • Strike down powerful foes with your giant carrot sword! Or throw it at them instead!
  • Fight dangerous bosses with devastating attacks!


Greetings, fellow knights!

Creating ExCarrotBur!! has been a big step forward for us. As you can imagine, building something very different from our prior projects takes a lot more effort and time to make but we hope the results will be well worth it!

From all of us here at Roundtable Games, we hope that you’ll have a great time following Castor on his grand adventure and we look forward to bringing you along on wherever our journey takes us next!

name: Ex Carrot Bur!!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
